did.abstract: The Lyon Family wood lots were located near Port Lynden, Lewis County, New York. This collection includes records related to the family's lands and personnel.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Lyon Family wood lots were located near Port Lynden, Lewis County, New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes a register of deeds granted by the executors of L.R. Lyon from 1870-1884, a register of bark peeled by both H.J. Botchford and Company and C.J. Lyon and Company that is dated from 1871-1883, a register of the Lyon Estate lands from 1873, and a register of lumber shipments from 1883-1886. This collection also includes personnel records of the Lyon family from 1874-1875.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Lyon Family Papers, 1872-1886. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Lyon Family Papers).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased from dealer Craig W. Ross in 1969.
